players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "Thank you Diana for sharing your investigation. Alice, do you have any response to this claim?"
You: "Diana, that's a bold lie. I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafia. Why are you trying to frame me?"
Diana: "Alice is lying. There's only one detective, and it's me. She's claiming a role that doesn't exist to save herself. Vote Alice."
You: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate me instead of a suspicious player? That makes no sense. Bob, she's setting us up."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate me first? That seems like an odd choice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "Thank you Diana for sharing your investigation. Alice, do you have any response to this claim?"
Alice: "Diana, that's a bold lie. I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafia. Why are you trying to frame me?"
Diana: "Alice is lying. There's only one detective, and it's me. She's claiming a role that doesn't exist to save herself. Vote Alice."
Alice: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate me instead of a suspicious player? That makes no sense. Bob, she's setting us up."
You: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate me first? That seems like an odd choice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
